alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington, southeastern Baker and northeastern Malheur Counties through 445 PM MDT/345 PM PDT/... At 401 PM MDT/301 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brosman Mountain, or 16 miles west of Weiser, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moores Hollow around 420 PM MDT. Farewell Bend State Park and Huntington around 340 PM PDT. Indian Head Mountain around 440 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; West Central Mountains
